name: Manipulation (Egg)
description:
Warning(s): Mild dark tones (emotional manipulation, mentions of mental illness, and death) There is only one ending. What was supposed to be a healthy break from the hustle and bustle of city life, turned into tragedy. Maybe if they weren't so selfish, things could've gone differently.

----

I made this game in about a day. Gameplay should only be a few minutes.

There are parts that are text-heavy, so if you don't like to read a lot, I'm sorry.

((Also, this is my first time using the HTML/browser feature. I hope there aren't too many issues! Apologies;; ))

----

✨TIPS: Check the countertop, sink, and stove. Also, please check the locked door upstairs after you have something to drink.
